content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
hello  how much
Hi, 20k$ in bitcoin
can you test for me？
and other one？

vmware-39.log.rar
This file is encrypted with a different ID
i know   ， you cant decrypt？
i want to know，  can you decrypt my network？
its  a different  id but you should be able to test it for me?
and  , is  your offer to decrypt  our entire network?
To decrypt a file encrypted with a different identifier, you must enter the chat with this identifier
and , is your offer to decrypt our entire network?
Yes
Do these different ids belong to you?
Yes
hello， Hello, I am a technician, I would like to ask you if you need to log in to the corresponding ID chat room?
If I need to decrypt A computer, I need to use the README in A computer and log in the chat room to find you according to the ID number in it. You can't use anything else, right
you made a test decrypt, after payment you can return all esxi and files.
i want to know how to use  tools， and   Does the decryption program have to be used on esxi systems? Or just any linux system?
yes esxi and win

I mean, is your decryption process complicated? Because of this I need to report to my administrator, we need to make a technical report for him to see  ，esxi decryptor must run under esxi system, or can it be decrypted under any linux system, if I upload the encrypted VMDK file to a linux system for decryption, can the decryption program decrypt normally? Not an esxi system

Procedure for decrypting ESXi:
- log in to vCenter
- enable ssh access to ESXi
- upload decryptor to ESXi via WinSCP or FileZilla; navigate to /tmp folder
- login to ssh with root privileges
- set permissions to run the decryptor with the command - chmod 777 decrypt
- launch decryptor ./decrypt
- follow the first method of decrypting by viewing the log file: tail -f /tmp/decrypt.llg, wait for the message at the end of the log - Your system is decrypted
- the second way is to check the presence on the disk file decrypt.pid command ls, which protects the decryptor from the restart
- the third way - ps | grep decrypt, as soon as decrypt.pid will be removed from the disk, or decrypt will disappear from the running processes, decrypt is complete
- check the decrypt.llg log file and see the message at the end that the system was successfully decrypted "Your system is decrypted"
- turn on virtual machines in ESXi

You cannot run multiple copies of a decryptor at the same time. After launching, the decryptor deletes the executable file and is demonetized, so that you cannot run the decryptor again and damage the files, this is normal.

If you have more than one ESXi host then you should not run the decryptor on all hosts simultaneously, make the decryption alternately, in the case of simultaneous operation of two decryptors may corrupt files and not be able to decrypt

If any files in another folder stay crypted, please use this command with path
Example:
./decrypt -i /tmp/files1/
you can use linux system

If we have purchased your decryptor, when you are online we have an inquiry about decryption technology, can you help? Please understand me, because I have to write a report to the boss, they will decide whether to buy or not
of course we stay online and are ready to help you with a technical issue
you won't have a problem, it's very simple. For win you only need to run exe decryptor, same with Linux
Promise not to take money to close the window,?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KLg-T8r-dGw
We have 5 years of work and a reputation, we are not a scam
I'll put that in my work report

after payment you will receive a decryptor and tech support if needed. 
And we won't bother you again
whether you pay or not, I don't care. I love my job and have money
we have rules, we can't make the price lower, made minimum price for you
i  and my  partner  will   reply you soon
I want to ask, we have several different windows encryption ID is not the same, use the same decryptor, or different ID decryptor?
write the extensions after payment, my boss will prepare a decryptor for them
How long can I get the decryptor after payment? Do you need me to provide anything
only provide extensions,after payment within 24 hours, usually faster. we'll wait for the boss, he'll send you the decryptor here

hi， did you delet  my  NAS   files
